title: Henrie-James Excellence in Education Endowment Fund II
description: To provide undergraduate scholarship awards for students enrolled in the five-year, Bachelor of Science (BS)/Master of Science (MS) or Bachelor of Arts (BA)/Master of Science (MS) degree program in Technology, Cybersecurity and Policy at CU Boulder.
marketingContent: To provide scholarships for undergraduate students in the Department of Applied Mathematics at the University of Colorado Boulder who show distinction.
